scripts.copy-templates: mkdirp dist/api-docs dist/client-generator/typescript dist/client-generator/typescript/templates dist/client-generator/dart dist/client-generator/dart/templates && cpy src/api-docs/*.hbs dist/api-docs/ && cpy src/client-generator/typescript/templates/*.hbs dist/client-generator/typescript/templates/ && cpy src/client-generator/dart/templates/*.hbs dist/client-generator/dart/templates/
